dr.evolution.alignment
Class ResamplePatterns

java.lang.Object
  dr.evolution.alignment.ResamplePatterns
All Implemented Interfaces:
PatternList, TaxonList, Identifiable, XHTMLable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Taxon>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BootstrapPatterns, JackknifePatterns, ShuffledSiteList
public abstract class ResamplePatterns
extends java.lang.Object
implements PatternList, XHTMLable

Provides an abstract base class for resampling patterns (i.e. bootstrap and jackknife).

Version:
$Id: ResamplePatterns.java,v 1.12 2005/05/24 20:25:55 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut
